items.text: short  of a length, rolls his fingers over it and fires it down the leg side, pulled away to deep fine leg
items.shortText: Lakmal to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: Ovy: "Even I'm afraid of life without Shakib,Tamim,Mushi,Riyad & Mashrafi. Youngsters are not stepping up for us! "
items.text: full and straying on the pads, turned away off them to deep backward square leg
short and sitting up nicely on the stumps for Shakib who clubs a pull powerfully through midwicket. Comfortably beats deep square leg running to his right
items.shortText: Lakmal to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: comes down the track and the bowler drags the length back. He manages to pull it away behind square for a tight brace
items.shortText: Lakmal to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.preText: Here comes Gunratane's change of pace
items.text: short of a length, spins in like an offbreak from outside off, tucked to midwicket
fullish length, pitching outside leg, waits for it before turning it away to the square-leg region
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: short of a length,swivels around and pulls to short fine leg
loopy length ball that's angled across and spins away. Narrowly misses the outside edge
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: ah, what a frustrating end to an innings! It was a nothing delivery, just short and Shakib backs away and slaps it straight back. Hit extremely hard but Gunaratne cups his hands in front of his face
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Shakib Al Hasan, OUT

dismissal.text: Shakib Al Hasan c & b Gunaratne 67 (63b 7x4 0x6) SR: 106.34

items.text: full outside off, pushed into the covers
Mushfiq rises on top of this short one outside off and crisply punches the ball up to cover
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: short, wide, flayed away to sweeper cover for just one
short, wide, Lakmal cops punishment this time. He slaps a square-cut past the left of backward point.
back of a length and just a shade outside off, Mahmudullah punches to the left of short cover and sets off to the other end
chipped in the air.... but the ball lands in front of a diving Asela at short cover. Mushfiq was early into a cover drive
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: Lakmal and SL aren't learning from their mistakes. He offers up plenty of width outside off and the length is begging on its knees to be cut. Scythed up and over backward point for another four
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: comes down the track but the bowler drags his length back and it finds the pad as he tries to defend
fullish length ball on middle and leg, turned away behind square leg
full and sliding on the pads, pats it down to backward square leg
full and angling in on middle, turned away behind square for one
that was so slow that he gets down to sweep it like an offbreak to deep square leg
spins in like an offbreak and tucks between midwicket and square leg
short outside off, waits before flaying it straight to point
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: pitched up on middle and leg, pushed down to wide long-on
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: very full around off, jams the bat down and squeezes it out into the off side
items.shortText: de Silva to Mahmudullah, no run
